meanings.definition: An act of bending the knee in worship or reverence.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, everyone made a genuflection before the altar.
meanings.sent2: The genuflection at the church service was a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful genuflection made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her genuflection to the queen was a symbol of loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The genuflection of the samurai was swift and graceful.

meanings.definition: The act of showing respect or submission by bending the knee.
meanings.sent1: He made a genuflection to his teacher before leaving the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's genuflection to the general displayed his obedience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sudden genuflection to the mouse was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The genuflection of the knight signaled his allegiance to the king.
meanings.sent5: Her genuflection to the elderly man touched everyone's hearts.
